title: Enterprise Data Lake Platform
description: Architected and implemented an on-premises data lake utilizing Hadoop ecosystem technologies including Kafka, Parquet, HBase, and Spark. This enterprise platform processed billions of financial transactions daily while providing both OLAP and OLTP capabilities through a unified data architecture.
impact: Enabled real-time data analytics and reporting across the enterprise while maintaining sub-second query performance

title: Intelligent Automation Platform
description: Led global engineering teams in building a comprehensive intelligent automation platform combining RPA and BPM capabilities. Delivered a no-code solution enabling business users to automate complex processes without requiring traditional development skills.
impact: Reduced process automation development time by 80% while expanding automation capabilities to non-technical users

title: Multi-Region Active-Active API Platform
description: Designed and implemented a globally distributed, active-active API architecture achieving 99.999% availability for mission-critical payment services. Implemented sophisticated failover and data consistency patterns across multiple geographic regions.
impact: Achieved five-nines availability while processing millions of financial transactions daily across multiple geographic regions
